      • listTypedInputs

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<URI,URI> listTypedInputs(URI operationUri)
        Given an operation, this method obtains the list of input URIs mapped to their annotated types (i.e., modelReferences). Note that the same input may have several annotations indicating the type.
        Specified by:
        listTypedInputs in interface ServiceManager
        Overrides:
        listTypedInputs in class ServiceManagerSparql
        Parameters:
        operationUri - the URI for which we want to obtain the inputs and their annotated types
        Returns:
        a Multimap with the inputs and their corresponding types.

      • addService

        public URI addService(uk.ac.open.kmi.msm4j.Service service)
               throws ServiceException
        Creates a Service Description in the system. Only needs to be fed with an MSM Service description. After successfully adding a service, implementations of this method should raise a ServiceCreatedEvent
        Specified by:
        addService in interface ServiceManager
        Overrides:
        addService in class ServiceManagerSparql
        Parameters:
        service - the input service description in terms of MSM
        Returns:
        the URI this service description was saved to
        Throws:
        ServiceException

        serviceUri - the URI of the service to delete
        Returns:

      • clearServices

        public boolean clearServices()
                      throws ServiceException
        Deletes all the services on the registry. This operation cannot be undone. Use with care. After successfully clearing the services, implementations of this method should raise a ServicesClearedEvent
        Specified by:
        clearServices in interface ServiceManager
        Overrides:
        clearServices in class ServiceManagerSparql
        Returns:
        true if the service registry was cleared.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

        Overrides:

        Returns:
        True if it is registered in the server
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • listModelReferences

        public Set<URI> listModelReferences(URI elementUri)

        Specified by:
        listModelReferences in interface ServiceManager
        Overrides:
        listModelReferences in class ServiceManagerSparql
        Parameters:
        elementUri - the URI of the element for which we want to obtain the model references
        Returns:
        a List of URIs with the model references of the given element. If there are no model references the List should be empty NOT null.
